Hello friend,can u please explain some things to me,cause im a newb :),
1st)Does This Include The Bruning Crusade?
2nd) How can we install cataclysm after this?
3)Ty for your lovely torrent!

@Liman_Bot

Hello,

1) Yes. This includes The Burning Crusade also.

2) Cataclysm is not supported by private servers (except some poor Chinese servers which allow connection to it and horribly bugged content that resembles another game more than World of Warcraft). If you still want to update this torrent to Cataclysm, start the game and type in your Battle.net account at login screen, and it will start downloading the Cataclysm from Battle.net. Once again, it's not supported by private servers which offer near-retail Wrath of the Lich King experience.

3) You are welcome.

First off, thanks for the upload ravenland.

Problem:
When at the login screen I am prompted to enter in my email and password. (Yes I am registered at Molten).
When the game is connecting, it says "Downloading Update". I let it update and it patched to 4.x.x and then proceeded to download 7+ gigs of updates. This broke the game I think, as my login details were no longer recognized at all.
I have re-downloaded the game again and am getting the same problem. It is wanting to automatically download a patch. 
Can someone help with this problem?

Thanks again.

@ groove420

Yes you made a mistake and patched up too high. 

You should have entered Molten account name at login screen (NOT email address).

Thanks for the quick reply ravenland.
I still am unable to log in, here's what I've got.
Version 3.3.5 (12340) (clean copy of the original download from here).

At the login screen>

Battle.net user name> Karela
Password> XXXXXXXXX

Press Login>

"The Information  you have entered is not valid.
Please check the spelling of the account name and password.
If you need help in retriving a lost or stolen password and account, see 
www.worldofwarcraft.com/loginsupport for more information"

I am registered at Molten and am currently logged in successfully under that name as well.

What am I doing wrong?

Thanks for any help.

@ groove420

1) Make sure your realmlist.wtf file says "set realmlist logon.molten-wow.com"

2) Have you activated your account? Every account is activated after you verify your email address (verification link is automatically sent to the registered email address).

Oh and if you got problems creating a realmlist file, create a text file in \WoW\Data\enUS called realmlist, and type the following: 
set realmlist arena-tournament.com
set patchlist bn

When finished, just change the file format to .wtf (so it's gonna be realmlist.wtf) and there ya go :D

With this realmlist you are able to enter the 3.3.5a Arena Tournament server (often referred as Abyssal), but you can always change the file.

guys, the reason you get like 85 seeders out of 1434, is that your max incoming connection count is set to maybe 100. go to the preferrences of your torrenting software, and change it to 99999. then, you can theroreticaly get all of the seeders at once. it will boost your DL rate from 1.5/2 mb a second, to about 7mb. :)

Quick question while I'm downloading this.  Will I have a problem running this and logging into Molten if I have the free download from Blizzard with a free BattleNet account also running on my PC?

@voraxith
No. You can freely and safely play on Molten and Battle.net. Log in to this torrent with your Molten account name.

@ravenland
I just want to say that you and everyone at Molten frakking rock!!!  This is the greatest thing in the history of ever, and I'm sooooooooo grateful for this.  No more shall I be stuck to a 20 level cap with all the crappy limitations from the Blizzard free trial simply because I'm too damn broke to pay the monthly fee.  Thank you thank you thank you!  By the way, it only took me like two and a half hours to download, so I suggest upping you maximum incoming bandwidth to speed up the process a bit.  And another question, though I'm not holding my breath on this one: is there a way to transfer my character sfrom my BattleNet account to my Molten account?

@voraxith
You're welcome. Unfortunately you can't transfer your character from retail account to Molten. Molten is by far largest private server and thousands of players appreciate that they can play Wrath of the Lich King 3.3.5a for free (Cataclysm is under development and they prefer not to release it early like other private servers).
Let's just stick with Wrath of the Lich King for now...  I played Cataclysm, and I prefer WotLK better.  Yet another reason why I like Molten.  Again, thanks to all those responsible.

Check out
eternal-wow.com  Well established alternative to Molten (Molten can have some long wait times to log in.)

http://wotlkserver.com/   - Shadowburn Wow

****Shadowburn Wow claims to be 98% working blizzlike server and they are currently working on Litch King!!!

@Rockoweed
Go to https://www.molten-wow.com/features/ to see difference between realms. There are a total of 6 realms at the time of writing this.

Lordaeron x1 (exact leveling pace as on retail)
Frostwolf x3 (x3 times faster leveling than on retail)
Neltharion x12 (12 times faster leveling than on retail)
Deathwing x12 (12 times faster leveling than on retail)
Sargeras x20 (20 times faster leveling than on retail)
Warsong (Instant level 80, oriented for PvP only)

For example on Neltharion leveling to 80 can take from 2 to 10 days, depending on how many hours you play per day.
